landing.title:
Web3 Applications
for Mass Adoption
landing.description: Lum Network is your gateway to the decentralized web.<br class="d-none d-lg-block"/>We built the first trust layer protocol for businesses and<br class="d-none d-lg-block"/>consumers and the first crypto index of Cosmos.

business.title:
The trust layer for
companies of the future

store.title: Content stamping
store.description: Authenticate and stamp content on-chain to ensure information is accurate, verified and publicly accessible while abiding with data privacy regulations.

tracability.title: Traceability
tracability.description: We introduce the Beam protocol to create temporary mutable states on the immutable decentralized Lum Network’s ledger. Thus enabling fully traceable content updates.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: The key element to create trust between businesses and their customers. Using a tamper proof, public decentralized ledger designed for accessibility.

practices.title: Business practices
practices.description: The new standard for companies to foster trust with their customers. The Lum Network’s aims to become a norm for the companies of the future.

companies.title: Not a disruption, <br class="d-none d-lg-block"/>but an evolution
companies.description: Enabling major third parties working between retailers and their customers to evolve rather than being disrupted by new technologies.

trust.title: Focused on <br class="d-none d-lg-block"/>large scale applications
trust.description: The Lum Foundation is focused on working with trusted third parties to quickly onboard thousands of retailers and millions of customers.

community.title: To create a massive <br class="d-none d-lg-block"/>community of Lum members
community.description: The Lum Network is designed to be the trust layer for millions of users without exposing the complexity of the underlying technology.

rewards.title:
Using a modern
Universal Reward
rewards.description:
In return for value creation made by their users, we enabled businesses to benefit from on-chain rewards.
Using a tangible asset, Lum Network’s native digital token, the LUM.

poweredBy.description1: Lum comes from the word “light” and expresses the value created by and for consumers throughout any retail experience lifecycle.
poweredBy.description2: It is the fuel of the Lum Network and is used by businesses to benefit from the trust layer while rewarding their customers, by validators and delegators to secure the network and many more.

security.title: BECOME THE FUTURE
security.description: Businesses use the Lum to pave the way of innovation in their respective fields.

stake.title: SECURE THE CHAIN
stake.description: The Lum is one of the key elements of the network as it allows its members to secure its usage using Delegated Proof-of-Stake.

future.title: STAKE AND EARN
future.description: Every single Lum holder can participate in securing the network by staking their Lum and getting rewarded for it.

lumki.title: Lumki
lumki.description:
Lumki is a reward mobile and web application enabling its users to earn Lum throughout dedicated cashback offers as well as creating quality content for retailers.

The service provides every user with a secure Lum wallet to easily redeem their rewards and convert them into coupons, fiat currency or send them to their own personal Lum wallet.

skeepers.title: Skeepers
skeepers.description:
Skeepers is a leading group in customer engagement for retailers.

Skeepers is using the Lum Network to stamp all their reviews, make them tamper-proof and ensure a true transparency on their validation and verification process.

As a partner of the Lum Network, Skeepers benefits from the Lum Foundation's gateway ecosystem. This enable them to connect to other applications such as Lumki and reward their users for creating quality content for their favorite retailers.

join.title: Join us ⨁
join.description:
If you think your company, your clients or customers can benefit from the Lum Network... then you are in the right place!

Get in touch with us to discover everything that we can offer to assist you building using the Lum Network.

We are here to make sure you do not need any advanced blockchain knowledge to build awesome applications.

The Lum Foundation is dedicated to make the Lum Network's ecosystem grow. We can therefore assist you in all the steps leading to the use of the Lum Network in production.

pOfS.title: Cosmos & Tendermint DPOS
pOfS.description: The most advanced and secure Delegated Proof-Of-Stake algorithm is used to secure the network.

carbon.title: Minimal carbon footprint
carbon.description: Lum Network is designed to be sustainable and uses DPOS which consumes 99% less energy than proof of work.

costs.title: Low transactions cost
costs.description: Having a very low transaction cost to enable its applications to remain competitive and efficient.

blocks.title: Fast block speed
blocks.description: Lum Network processes blocks under 8 seconds, enabling its users to benefit from fast transactions.

getInformedModal.title:
Lum Network
Main Net Launch
getInformedModal.description:
Register to the Lum Network private sale whitelist now and get a chance to be the first aboard.

Or simply join our newsletter to keep up to date with the Lum Network announcements.

cards.title: Community-based
cards.description: Lum Network promotes a decentralized and community-based value creation since 2018.

cards.title: Built with battle-tested tech
cards.description: Scalable, secure and interconnected infrastructure powered by the Interchain Stack (Cosmos-SDK, Tendermint, IBC)

cards.title: Green blockchain
cards.description: Our blockchain is designed to be sustainable and uses DPoS consuming 99% less energy than Proof-of-Work.

cards.title: Seamless User Experience
cards.description: We have a strong focus on UX to remove barriers to entry as our vision is a future where everyone uses crypto.

card.title: Skeepers Rewards
card.description: Companies can now easily provide crypto rewards to their consumers for great user-generated content.

page.description1: Skeepers Rewards is a social wallet to store $LUM earned as loyalty, cashback, and engagement rewards.
page.description2: Every single Skeepers Rewards user therefore becomes a natural crypto holder.

details.title: Building a Web App with Seamless Integration of Crypto-Related Features
details.description: Skeepers Rewards is a social wallet to store LUM earned as loyalty, cashback, and engagement rewards.

card.title: DFract
card.description: First Interchain yield earning index with the mission to bring more users to the Internet of Blockchains.

page.description1: DFract is a decentralized index of Cosmos-SDK based blockchains. $DFR is the Protocol’s native crypto-asset.
page.description2: The Internet of Blockchains is growing rapidly, with 250+ projects and $61+ billion dollars in assets. DFract is the simplest way to diversify your assets on the Interchain.

details.title:
One Token,
One Ecosystem
details.description: Our webapp simplifies the diversification over multiple Interchain tokens: owning one $DFR is like owning a basket of assets.

toolsPage.title: Tools
toolsPage.description1: At Lum Network we believe in open-source code for a more transparent and community-centric code that allow communication between builders.
toolsPage.description2: Open-source tools embrace our vision of Mass Adoption since it allows others to built on top of the Lum Network for their own purpose.

wallet.title:
Native
Lum Wallet
wallet.description: The wallet is tailored-suit for the Interchain and has proved his liability with multiple projects that forked it

explorer.title:
A specific explorer to view
the specific messages
explorer.description: Specific messages have been developped for the review&rewards use case. You can see them on our dedicated explorer
